**** Redesign of the Canadian Space Agency Intranet Site
_____________________________________________________________________
Published on: **2023-02-28**
Closing Date: **2023-03-15 14:00:00**

**RFP Description:** Amendment 1
The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for the Redesign of the Canadian Space Agency Intranet Site. The Agency seeks to migrate its current intranet site from Drupal 7 to SharePoint in Microsoft 365, implementing a new intranet site on the department's SharePoint platform and migrating the content of the current site before **December 31st, 2023**.

**Objective:**
The objective of this requirement is to create a modern, user-friendly, and secure intranet site that aligns with the Canadian Space Agency's digital transformation and technology strategy.

**Important Dates:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** **2023-03-15 14:00:00**
* **Duration:** Contract period will be from the contract award date to **March 31st, 2024** with an option to extend for one additional year.

**Trademarks and Warranties:** 
Bidders must ensure that their proposal meets all the requirements outlined in the tender documents.

**Language:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language, but the Contracting Authority will provide answers to questions and issues presented in writing by the Bidder.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the tender documents.

**Mandatory Documents:**
* Amendment 1 of the Request for Proposal
* All other documents specified in the Tender Description

Note:
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier.
* This requirement is open to those SBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the Montreal Metropolitan Region for the professional domain of expertise: 7. Legacy Support and Transition.
* The Selected Supplier shall be selected based on evaluation of this requirement.

Contact Information:
Sophorn Sok
Contracting Authority
Phone: 514-708-6583
Email: sophorn.sok@asc-csa.gc.ca

Please direct all inquires regarding this RFP requirement to the Contracting Authority identified above. 
A very good and professional RFP (Request for Proposal) will be sure of success.   Cumming. 2022-12-23 (t--11732-en)
